title: LOL at Bronze/Silver Ranked games
body:
People with 90% win-rates and a massive increases in stats compared to rest of the season.


Wtf you talking about? I'm coaching..... for money... and winning games for my client... Using his/her account LOL


Please

Smurfs, account sharers and boosters kindly fuck off.


Thanks

replies.body: Haha I feel ya~ i dropped down cuz of that~ and dont feel like playing until new season. Cuz season is ending many players  are asking their friends to boost em up to silver if they are bronze & and to gold if they are silver just to end season well. Some just want to get those frames around them in loading screen. Some high elos ceebs playing ranked on their own account cuz of boosters from higher elo than they are therefore boosting low elos. In other words for example plat player faces challenger smurf or booster and thats why he boosts others so that he can play ranked while he himself is waiting for the new season to start and avoid demotion until then. Some high elos are playing just normals until new season, thats why winning in normals got harder too. Just wait out bro
It's a bit shit though. Smurfs are making the climb impossible (unless they are on my team which is never)
